result.reason: RDP Fullscreen resolution calculation improperly multiplies physical Screen.Bounds by DPI scale (ResolutionScalingFactor), likely causing double-scaling and subsequent server-side fallback to lower resolutions.
result.approach: Modify RdpProtocol.cs to use Screen.Bounds directly without ResolutionScalingFactor multiplication when setting DesktopWidth/Height for RDPResolutions.Fullscreen.
